search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for MRPeasy (mrpeasy.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for MRPeasy can be found at: [https://www.mrpeasy.com/pricing/](https://www.mrpeasy.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: MRPeasy Pricing | Affordable Manufacturing Software Plans | Free Trial

extracted_content.content:
Choose your MRPeasy edition. Try it for free.
---------------------------------------------

**How many users?**

**Billed monthly** **Billed annually** (1 month free)

### Starter

$49

/user/month

Users beyond 10 - $79/10 users

[Get started](https://www.mrpeasy.com/sign-up/?pcg=1)

*   [Main functions](https://www.mrpeasy.com/pricing/#functions-b-345-1)
    *   Production Planning and Reporting
    *   BOM Management
    *   Drag and Drop Rescheduling
    *   Lot Traceability
    *   Reporting via Internet-Kiosk
    *   Supply Chain Management (SCM)
    *   Warehouse Management System (WMS)
    *   Workforce Planning
    *   Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
    *   Standard Accounting
    *   Multi-Language
    *   Multi-Currency
*   Integrations: QuickBooks Online, Xero, Shopify, Magento, BigCommerce, WooCommerce, Pipedrive, ShipStation, Zapier

/user/month

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on a per-user model with additional charges for users beyond 10.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes advanced features for growing businesses.
features: Overlap and Special Sequence of Production Operations
